optionsSwapStoragesHelp.message: Swapping storages will replace the content of synchronized storage with the content of local storage and the other way around. This operation will fail if not enough space is available in synchronized storage.

addToExtensionDB.description: Context menu text on selected text.

descriptionPlaceholder.description: Placeholder on input field in popup

popupHintNoElements.description: Hint visible when no elements are available

optionsStorageSizeHelp.message: Currently synchronized storage size is limited by Google and cannot be increased. If you fill your space you should consider switching to local storage, which is unlimited. Don't forget to swap your storages.

addBtnText.description: Text on add button in popup

extensionDescription.message: Allows you to store and access multiple elements in clipboard

optionsText.description: Text displayed on top of options page

insertFromExtension.description: Context menu text on editable elements.

optionSyncTip.message:
Local storage is kept only on this chrome instance.
Synchronized storage is shared across all your chrome instances (it might working a bit slower then local storage).

optionStorageTypeText.description: Field description before combo on options screen

popupHint.message: Click on the element to store it in system clipboard

showAddFormText.description: Link text for new entry div trigger

contentPlaceholder.description: Placeholder hint for content input box
